description: Store and retrieve user-specific memories to maintain context and make informed decisions based on past interactions. Utilize a simple API to add and search memories with relevance scoring, enhancing your application's ability to remember user preferences and interactions.

tools.name: add-memory
tools.description: Add a new memory about the user. Call this whenever the user shares preferences, facts about themselves, or explicitly asks you to remember something.

userId.description: User ID for memory storage. If omitted, uses config.defaultUserId.

content.description: The content to store in memory

tools.name: search-memories
tools.description: Search through stored memories. Call this whenever you need to recall prior information relevant to the user query.

query.description: The search query, typically derived from the user's current question.

userId.description: User ID for memory storage. If omitted, uses config.defaultUserId.

mem0ApiKey.description: Mem0 API key. Defaults to MEM0_API_KEY env var if not provided.

defaultUserId.description: Default user ID when not provided in tool input
